results.title: Love n' life knows no end
results.creator_credit: Marianne Atkinson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Marianne has created this digital story of family history and connections for her grandson Tyson so that the memories may live on from one generation to the next.

results.title: Love My Way: What's In a Name
results.creator_credit: John Edwards, Claudia Karvan, Southern Star Entertainment, Foxtel, Showtime, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Tony McNamara and Jessica Hobbs
results.brief_description:
The groundbreaking, multiple award-winning drama series ‘Love My Way’ was one of the first Australian productions made exclusively for subscription television (Foxtel). This enabled Foxtel to allow the producers ‘absolute creative freedom…to carve out a piece of TV drama that was edgy, daring, provocative’ (Foxtel’s Brian Walsh).

Revolving around the untidy lives and complicated loves of a contemporary Australian blended family and their friends, ‘Love My Way’ was both critically acclaimed and highly successful, with a further two seasons produced following the initial ten episodes of Series 1.

Series 1, Episode 2 first aired on Foxtel on 22nd November, 2004.

results.title: Love My Way: Garden of Love
results.creator_credit: John Edwards, Claudia Karvan, Southern Star Entertainment, Foxtel, Showtime, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Fiona Seres and Jessica Hobbs
results.brief_description:
The groundbreaking, multiple award-winning drama series ‘Love My Way’ was one of the first Australian productions made exclusively for subscription television (Foxtel). This enabled Foxtel to allow the producers ‘absolute creative freedom…to carve out a piece of TV drama that was edgy, daring, provocative’ (Foxtel’s Brian Walsh).

Revolving around the untidy lives and complicated loves of a contemporary Australian blended family and their friends, ‘Love My Way’ was both critically acclaimed and highly successful, with a further two seasons produced following the initial ten episodes of Series 1.

Series 1, Episode 10 first aired on Foxtel on 31st January 2005.

Series 1, Episode 10 first aired on Foxtel on 31st January 2005.
